docs.text: if you're the kind of person who goes to see movies just because you long for some of that overpriced theatre popcorn ( butter optional ) , then this is the movie for you !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: indeed , this has got to be either one of the most unimaginative rip-offs of other recent action movies , or an incredibly unfunny spoof of them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's difficult to fathom such insipidness unless you actually watch this film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but at least we're warned very quickly that we may regret our ticket purchase , giving us an opportunity to sneak on out and into the adjacent show .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: what are the four ingredients of a really bad action movie ?
docs.label: negative

docs.text: first , the movie gives us an introductory premise .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: huge caverns exist deep beneath the ocean floor , and in this area , many ships have disappeared .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: oooh . . . scary !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: secondly , a cheesy soundtrack tries to connote a tone of mystery , but only succeeds in drowning our ears with an abrasive musical score .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: third , the main character is a mercenary that delivers goods without asking about the contents of his cargo ( treat williams ) .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he operates a sophisticated military-style pt boat and every word that comes out of his mouth is awash in comical flippancy .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: finally , in the cargo hold , we see those that hired him .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they are also mercenaries that have tough-looking haircuts , talk with accents , and try to show how macho they are .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: during their trip across the stormy sea , their boat suffers an incident and requires repairs .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: spotting a cruise ship in the distance , they make their way to the ocean liner and devise a plan to raid the machine shop , take the parts that they need , and then continue on their merry way .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: little do they know that this cruise ship has become infested by some kind of ocean monster .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yet , they board the ship armed to the hilt with grenades and machine guns that can kill dozens in a matter of seconds .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is nothing more than a by-the-book action film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: their realization of the situation that they're in doesn't happen until they are in the bowels of the boat .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: those who are dumb enough to stray off on their own will ultimately get killed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the corridors on the ship are narrow , misty , and provide the kind of atmosphere that all scare-fests must have .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: yet , despite the predictable nature of this film , there are some scary " boo " moments .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but most of it is just outright silly .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and this film is unusually gory too .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: monsters basically suck off the flesh and spit out skeletal remains .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: there is one particularly neat scene where a monster has been cut apart and reveals a victim that is still alive .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he screams horribly as the monster's digestive juices continue to slowly eat him away .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: additionally , it borrows heavily from speed2 , alien and a bunch of other recent films .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the mercenaries even run into a lone , surviving passenger ( femke jannsen ) who looks amazingly like sandra bullock .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to be honest , when i left the theatre , i just had to laugh at how witless the film was .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's moronic fun at best .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so , if you're hankering for a large bucket of popcorn served with a side of silliness , then this might just hit the spot .
docs.label: negative
